---
title: "Flexdashboard"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(plotly)
library(readr)
```


```{r}

library(p8105.datasets)
data("instacart")

instacart %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
  
instacart %>% 
  filter(aisle == "fresh vegetables") %>% 
  mutate(order_dow = as.character(order_dow)) %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~order_hour_of_day, color = ~order_dow, type = "box", 
          colors = "Set2") 

instacart %>%
  group_by(aisle) %>%
  summarize(n = n()) %>%
  arrange(-n)

```
